function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases may be spread in the households through close contact and shared living spaces.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within households.","Mitigation":"Promote regular hand washing, disinfection of shared surfaces, and proper ventilation in households.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV sanitization devices, IoT-based monitoring systems for air quality and ventilation.","People":"Household members, especially those with compromised immune systems.","Owner":"Health authorities, community leaders, household members."},{"Description":"High participation and interaction in the study may lead to increased risk of disease transmission among participants.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within the study participants.","Mitigation":"Limit in-person interactions, promote virtual participation, and enforce social distancing measures.","Technologies":"Video conferencing platforms, virtual collaboration tools, health check apps for participants.","People":"Study participants, researchers, and staff involved in data collection.","Owner":"Researchers, study organizers, and institutional review boards."},{"Description":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene practices may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases during the study.","Impact":"Elevated risk of disease transmission due to poor sanitation and hygiene.","Mitigation":"Provide education on proper sanitation practices, distribute hygiene kits, and ensure cleanliness of study facilities.","Technologies":"Sanitation monitoring systems, contactless sanitation solutions, educational apps for hygiene practices.","People":"Study participants, support staff, and researchers.","Owner":"Study organizers, health and safety coordinators, facility management."}]}
